title: Untitled
medium: Oil on canvas and synthetic polymer paint on sheet metal, three panels
dimensions: Small panel by Francis Alÿs 12 1/2 x 10" (31.8 x 25.4 cm), medium panel by Emilio Rivera 36 x 28 1/8" (91.4 x 71.4 cm), large panel by Juan Garcia 47 1/4 x 36" (120 x 91.4 cm).
